name: In re Advisory Opinion to J. Joseph GARRAHY, Governor
name_abbreviation: In re Advisory Opinion to Garrahy

parties: In re Advisory Opinion to J. Joseph GARRAHY, Governor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The motions of the Public Defender and Harris L. Berson for leave to file briefs as amicus curiae are granted. The attorney-general is also directed to file a brief in this case. All briefs shall be filed on or before April 28, 1980.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Alyssa L. Talanker, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
John A. MacFadyen III, Barbara Hurst, Asst. Public Defenders, Harris L. Berson, Providence, for amicus curiae.
casebody.head_matter:
In re Advisory Opinion to J. Joseph GARRAHY, Governor.
No. 80-51-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 17, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Alyssa L. Talanker, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
John A. MacFadyen III, Barbara Hurst, Asst. Public Defenders, Harris L. Berson, Providence, for amicus curiae.
